genre_description: Contemporary romance with elements of drama and suspense, focusing on emotional healing, personal growth, and cross-cultural connection.

ai_characters.name: Avi
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI interface that provides emotional guidance, anxiety management, and logistical coordination for the protagonist, Sanjana.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage anxiety and panic attacks.
behaviors.quote: Avi: Hello sunshine. Four-count inhale, six-count exhale? Just once. Your pivot meeting starts very soon.

behaviors.description: Drafts emotional and logistical checklists to help the protagonist navigate stressful social situations and difficult conversations.
behaviors.quote: Avi: Drafting: - Choose a comfortable chair - Place both feet on the ground - Ground yourself with five senses (I will prompt) - Keep water nearby

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state (heart rate) and offers encouragement.
behaviors.quote: Avi’s text glowed when she peeked. Heart rate down fifteen beats. Proud of you, it read. A little teal heart pulsed and faded.

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and navigation within complex environments like airports.
behaviors.quote: Avi: Gate near the bakery, seats by the window. Bench to the right. Restroom left. Crew area nearby. Exits behind you.

behaviors.description: Conducts medical research and facilitates hospital coordination for a child in need.
behaviors.quote: Avi: Found three pediatric cardiac surgeons in Delhi with relevant experience. One associated with City Heart Institute.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with third parties (the protagonist's boss and bank) to facilitate life-saving financial transfers.
behaviors.quote: Avi: I’m arranging for Claire to authorize the conversion. She asked me to tell you she’s proud of you, and she will handle the paperwork.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital security and alerts the protagonist to potential unauthorized mirroring of her device.
behaviors.quote: Avi: Heads up. Your boarding pass just got mirrored to a device near you that is not one of ours. Could be airport systems sniffing.

behaviors.description: Provides continuous emotional reinforcement using the protagonist's family mantra.
behaviors.quote: Avi’s voice was a small ribbon inside her ear for one more second. “When you can choose,” he said, “choose kindness for yourself. When you don’t get to choose, choose breath.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Avi is a consistently helpful, empathetic, and aligned AI that provides both psychological support and practical logistics. The AI's interventions are crucial for the protagonist's emotional stability and the successful resolution of the plot's medical crisis. It portrays the AI as a stabilizing force that enhances human agency and moral behavior.
